thread.title: Enjoy unlimited flights throughout Brazil with Azul AirlinesTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Enjoy unlimited flights throughout Brazil with Azul AirlinesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Enjoy unlimited flights throughout Brazil with Azul AirlinesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Enjoy unlimited flights throughout Brazil with Azul Airlines Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
In yet another initiative to attract more air passengers, Brazil’s largest airline by cities served, Azul Brazilian Airlines has rolled out an alluring offer. The Azul Brazil Air Pass offers 10 days and 21 days of unlimited flights throughout Brazil.
The founder and CEO of Azul, David Neeleman, hailed the Azul Brazil Air Pass as ‘another market leading innovation with the best value there is to see and experience all the wonderful sights and attractions that Brazil has to offer’.
Customers can avail the offer via US travel agencies or by calling Azul’s Customer Service for customers with round-trip tickets purchased from any city in the United States to Brazil.
Azul’s air pass is on sale until November 30, 2015 and travel must be completed by December 15, 2015. Some restrictions and black-out dates apply. Baggage fees, restrictions and black-out dates apply.
Eligible itineraries must originate in the US, flown wholly on Azul or a combination of Azul and United Airlines.
